inclusion.criterion: Primary diagnosis: eating disorder according to DSM IV
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnostic and statistical manual of mental disorders fourth edition Criteria based on diagnostic interview

inclusion.criterion: Participated in at least three failed specialized eating disorder treatments
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Having the mental capacity to make provide informed consent to research participation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Alert and cooperative, no signs of dementia

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Experiences slowness of movement and tremors, difficulty initiating movements, stiffness and slowness in general

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease, experiences symptoms that may indicate somatic instability.
